mapper.select:
select count(resell_no) from resell
and resell_name like '%${searchWord1}%'
and resell_name like '%${searchWord2}%'
and resell_name like '%${searchWord3}%'

select count(item_no) from item
and item_name like '%${searchWord1}%'
and item_name like '%${searchWord2}%'
and item_name like '%${searchWord3}%'

select resell_no, resell_name, resell_seller, item_price, date_format(resell_writedate, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') resell_writedate from resell
and resell_name like '%${searchWord1}%'
and resell_name like '%${searchWord2}%'
and resell_name like '%${searchWord3}%'
order by resell_writedate desc limit #{onePageRecord} offset ${offsetPoint};

select item_no, item_name, item_price, item_image, item_postdate from item
and item_name like '%${searchWord1}%'
and item_name like '%${searchWord2}%'
and item_name like '%${searchWord3}%'
order by item_postdate desc limit #{onePageRecord} offset ${offsetPoint};
mapper.insert: insert into item(item_name, item_seller, item_price, item_category, item_detail) values(#{item_name}, #{item_seller}, #{item_price}, #{item_category}, #{item_detail})
insert into resell(item_no, resell_name, resell_seller, resell_comment, resell_addr) values(#{item_no}, #{resell_name}, #{resell_seller}, #{resell_comment}, #{resell_addr})
